name: SokoVirus
description:
Controls:

operate the menus/restart level with the Z and X buttons and arrow keys.

The Game:

This is a simple Sokoban game about a little virus and the crazy adventures he goes on. This is my first Pico 8 game (what is Pico 8?). You can start a new game or play any of the levels from the main menu. This was created over the last month. Big shout-out to Lazy Devs Academy and Nerdy Teachers for the awesome tutorials and sound advice! You can read the postmortem in the following thread: https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=52398

Contact/Support:

Support is always welcome but not required :)

Thanks:

My Wife for encouraging me in this endeavor and the great Pico 8 community :).
